text: Amblyptilia direptalis is a moth of the family Pterophoridae. It is known from Ethiopia, Kenya, South Africa, Tanzania, India and Sri Lanka. The larvae feed on Scutellaria discolor and Teucrium quadrifarium. ==References== Category:Amblyptilia Category:Moths described in 1864 Category:Plume moths of Africa Category:Plume moths of Asia Category:Moths of Africa Category:Moths of India
title: Amblyptilia direptalis
